title: Banning Balance [POLL]
body:
I was thinking about this and everyone says we need more bans correct?

I don't like that I don't get a ban in ranked and have to deal with whatever slot 1 wants to ban...

Why can't we have 10 bans and everyone gets to ban 1 champion???

With my 1 ban I can choose wisely who I don't want to play against or use my bans and communicate as a team to ban certain champs...


PS- Please comment if No or Yes c:
